protein.specific_function: Sulfotransferase that utilizes 3'-phospho-5'-adenylyl sulfate (PAPS) as sulfonate donor to catalyze the sulfonation of steroids and bile acids in the liver and adrenal glands.

pathway.name: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

reference.reference_text: Comer KA, Falany JL, Falany CN: Cloning and expression of human liver dehydroepiandrosterone sulphotransferase. Biochem J. 1993 Jan 1;289 ( Pt 1):233-40.
